name: fireball1min
description:
An action puzzle where you need to collect as many crystals as possible in one minute.
Yellow blocks, after touching, explode in a second or two. The blue ones can crush. Purple can be shattered into crystals.
The Fireball will explode itself in a minute, the final radius of destruction depends on the number of crystals found.
A full yellow tongue of flame means your radius has reached 250, and a white tongue of flame - 500.

Сontrols:
1. Keyboard WASD/Arrows
2. Gamepad Arrows (button-restart)
